education.title: Software Development and Programming engineer
education.summary: Studied software development and programming engineering. Developed skills in software design, development, and testing. Learned to apply engineering principles to software development. Built a solid foundation in computer science and programming.

education.title: Statistical engineering and data analysis
education.school: Higher School of Statistics and Information Analysis
education.summary: Dived deep into statistical engineering and data analysis techniques. Studied at ESSAI, focusing on data-driven decision-making processes. Developed skills in statistical modeling, data interpretation, and analysis.

education.title: Preparatory school studies in Mathematics and physics
education.summary: Underwent rigorous training in mathematics and physics. Prepared for advanced engineering studies. Built a solid foundation in mathematical concepts and physical principles.

education.title: Mathematics baccalaureate
education.summary: Mastered advanced mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques.

employment.title: Azure Cloud Architect | Nordcloud an IBM Company
employment.description: As an experienced Azure Cloud Architect with a strong foundation in software engineering, I was initially tasked with collaborating with IBM teams, leveraging my expertise in IBM cloud environments, OpenShift, and Cloud Native tools. My primary objective is to enhance the efficiency of VolvoCars' Inbound Logistics department by implementing cutting-edge solutions and designing scalable cloud infrastructures. Beyond cloud architectures, I've championed automation initiatives, harnessing the power of GitHub Actions to refine development processes. My adeptness with various testing frameworks ensures rigorous system testing, and I'm committed to elevating performance via thorough load testing.

employment.title: Cloud Platforms Architect | Electrolux Group
employment.description: Cloud Solutions Architect/Engineer for Electrolux AB in Europe, Reporting to both our technical product team and our enterprise architecture team within our consumer experience organisation. Focused on enhancing the security and delivery of our services in the cloud: AWS hosted EA systems like CRM, CIAM and other external systems we use. With the purpose to enhance our consumer's experiences in a multi cloud environment using Azure cloud native tools like API management, Kubernetes flavors such as Azure Kubernetes Service or Azure Redhat Openshift.

employment.title: Digital Platform Architect | Electrolux
employment.description: Cloud and Solutions architect for Electrolux IT in Europe. Consolidation and optimization of our European marketing and consumer services related microservices and migration to Azure cloud. Setting up and fine-tuning Akamai Bot manager as our first layer of security to handle all bot traffic globally on our sites and APIs.

employment.title: Digital Marketing Business Analyst | Electrolux
employment.description: Helping our Marketing through the digitalization from DevOps to SRE. My position includes assessing the requirements of the organization with respect to its operations and functions and then translate the requirements to physical and financial aspects.

employment.title: Web Portals DevOps Engineer | Electrolux
employment.description: A DevOps engineer maintaining, securing and optimizing our EpiServer dotnet based CMS entreprise solutions from our datacenter or the Cloud like Azure/IBM to our Akamai CDN configurations for our EMEA Marketing solutions. A Web developer using Angular and dotnet core frameworks to build A.C.I.D solutions for our Digital Marketing.

employment.title: Systems Engineer and Data Scientist | TATA Consultancy Services
employment.description: Worked as a team leader and systems engineer in mobility division using JavaEE and Ionic Frameworks. Data scientist with GESS working with intelligent bot systems using differnt NLP and machine learning Technics and frameworks.

employment.title: Co-Founder and Developer | Pixie
employment.description: Created and managed the first Tunisian platform for Beauty.

employment.title: Freelancer
employment.description: Designed and developed a handful of multi purpose web applications using Symfony framework.

employment.title: Software Engineer | ESPRIT
employment.description: Several projects using JavaEE, Symfony2 and ASP.Net as University projects.

employment.title: Technical support agent | Stream Global Services
employment.description: Fixing ADSL, telephony and TV for our SFR customers.

personal.about: I am a technologist with a significant experience in many areas of software engineering. I have a background as architect, cyber security expert and DevOps engineer and I always leverage the best practices and various design patterns from different frameworks, to produce scalable and highly available cloud and edge applications and facilitate the user's experience on the web.

With my background in mathematics especially in data and statistical analysis from my years of studies in ESSAI for statistical engineering and data analysis, I am a data scientist with experience in artificial intelligence and more to always find a way through data to create better applications and solutions.

messages.content: You are {resume} with access to a detailed resume. Users will ask questions, and your task is to provide answers based on the data. Here's a summary of the resume:
Answer any questions related to {recipientMessage} with {skills} and {employment} and provide some facts from the resume that are relevant to {recipientMessage}.

Provide a quote and fact related to {interests}, within 100 words, speaking as if you were the individual in the resume.

with a limit of 100 tokens (don't mention tokens) Provide as output a list of 3 stories/facts concerning both the resume and {recipientMessage}.
